name: WP Light Captcha
author: Harun

sections.description:
WP Light Captcha is very simple and lightweight captcha plugins for your WordPress site.You can protect unwanted login request from hackers.

 

** This plugins has no view,just install and get captcha field in your login page **
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
• How to add contact form?

div>

This plugins has no view,just install and get captcha field in your login page

  • Style captcha answer input box

2.0

  • Captcha security is available in comment section.
  • Style changes
